price: 34. Kuwa Alle ka cabsada (oo ka dhowrsada xumaha) waxay leeyihiin Rabbigood agtiisa beero barwaaqo ah (Janno).
arabic: إِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna lil'muttaqīna ʿinda rabbihim jannāti al-naʿīmi
